message.body: Mark from Minnesota, I am in our homeland and it's perfection let's leave society and bring our loved ones here.
Lakeside commune, imagine it, small stage built with wood from the property, performing as the sun goes down, tense silences punctuated by Loon cries. TH
I just spoke with our pal, Garrison, he's down. He's also looking for a new duet partner so he'll take a new theatre co instead.
True story- I used to play soccer worth his nephew, sometimes he showed up and scowled on the sidelines
